topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556047166368723344ca0700#post_556047166368723344ca0700
What happened is that I decided to watch an episode of the "Battle of the planets" dub of Gatchaman for a laugh. And it wasn't nearly as painful as I expected, So I decided to check out other famous dubs of that style.

And I liked Voltron enough that I'm continuing with that.
